filterById.name: filterById
filterById.short_desc: Filter the query on the id column
filterById.long_desc: Example usage: $query->filterById(1234); // WHERE id = 1234 $query->filterById(array(12, 34)); // WHERE id IN (12, 34) $query->filterById(array('min' => 12)); // WHERE id > 12

id.name: id
id.short_desc: The value to use as filter. Use scalar values for equality. Use array values for in_array() equivalent. Use associative array('min' => $minValue, 'max' => $maxValue) for intervals.
